content.detailedDescription: I was standing in a field behind my house at 10:10 admiring how clear the night was when a very bright white light appeared in the northwest sky.  the light reminded me of a halogen spotlight intensity.  it was at least 5 times the size of venus at full magnitude.  it was a constant light with no blinking lights that are seen on conventional aircraft.  it flew overhead toward the southeast horizon.  the light stayed on a straight course but did seem to slow down as it reached the sky above me.  no sound was emitted from the object.  it appeared to be flying halfway between the ground and the cruising altitude of jets.  as it reached the southeast sky the light quickly faded out and abruptly disappeared.  it was nowhere near the horizon and should have been visible for another minute or so before disappearing.  i have spent countless hours looking at the night sky and have never seen anything like this.  i had an obvious feeling that i was watching something that was not anything conventional.
content.summary: Very bright constant light flew overhead with no sound and quickly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10:20 (maybe a little after...Could have been about 10:25) or so last night and i was watching tv in my room. i was staying up to see if i could view the rocket launch from va beach that was going to happen at 11:10.  for some reason, i had the feeling to look out of my bedroom window (which faces the nw - the rocket was to be seen se).  it was a very clear night and i noticed that up in the sky, there was a large bright (brighter than the stars) ball of light.  it definitely was not a star, it was much larger than all the stars, it was not as high up in the sky as the stars.  there wasn't a color, it was almost like a lightbulb compared to the stars.  the light did not flicker, blink, or anything like that.  it was just a ball of bright light. it moved very smoothly and very slowly across the sky in a straight line.  i've never seen anything like that before and i was really thinking that it might turn out to be a plane or something, so i kept watching it get closer and closer.  the object never changed or moved away from the straight line path it was on.  there were no lights blinking or any other lights around just the one ball of light.  it was starting to get out of my sight from my view in my room and i wanted my husband to see this, so i went down 2 flights of stairs to the basement, tried to wake him up (was unsuccessful), went back up to the 1st floor and out the back door so i could keep watching this light.  i was still able to continue watching it pass over a large area across the sky for another 2 minutes or so.  the light then all of a sudden just dimmed right out (took just a moment) and then it was gone.  i would say that the entire viewing of this light lasted about 7 minutes.  i was able to see the rocket launch at 11:10 and the rocket was actually seen at the exact spot that light dimmed out.  i thought that was ironic.  all in all, i have never seen anything that made me think i saw a ufo until last night and i am intrigued to keep my eye on the sky now!
content.summary: Slow moving bright ball of light

content.detailedDescription: My wife let our 3 dogs out at 3:30am. at 3:45am she went to let them back in and noticed bright flashing colorful object in ne sky and woke me up to see it. i got up and grabbed the binoculars and my cigarretes and went outside to see. it was very low and bright flashing red & blue&green and white. it kept jumping or spining up and down and side to side slightly. truly a beautiful sight to behold, the closest i've ever seen. it stayed in the same area moving slightly for a hour and a half. then it started moving higher and further away till it just looked like a colorful bright star in the distance.I sat in a lawn chair drinking coffee and smoking for two hours till the sun was rising and lit the sky so i could'nt see it any longer. around 5:30 am or so i was scaning the se sky behind me and saw a bright light scream across the sky at a very fast rate of speed. i sat outside watching with amazement and goosebumps all over for two hours. my wife went back to bed after watching the first object for a hour or so. i've been watching the sky since i was a kid. i'm 47 this year and this is the first time i've been able to see one this close. i feel like a kid on christmas morning. i'm up for the day now, i could'nt go back to sleep if i tried. i feel truly blessed to have had this experience!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: First one was hovering low colorful twinkling lights/second streaked across sky very fast

content.detailedDescription: I just got out of shower,,abt 10;15pm,,had that feeling again,to go out and lookup at all the stars out,very clear tonight,as soon as i went out back,i looked up,towards se,i saw  a big huge low star,im thinkin,hmm,cool,wonder what star that is,than,i noticed ,its moving real slow,cool,its another ufo,it was very,big and bright,very low,i watched it going se,in about another min,it dimmed,then disappeared into nowhere,as,alot of them do i see,some go all the way across the sky till out of view,some just vanish,/it was,not a aircraft,i was in the military,i now what planes look like,,it was not flashing,or a shooting star,but ,a typical ufo,/its about the 12th i've seen,this yr,i saw another low 1 just like this about a month ago,at abt 3am,low and slow going ne,i havent seen many this yr,i wonder why not,cause,last yr,i,and my friends saw about 45,ufo's,flying over nwpa,usa,,over warren,always at night,on clear nights,between,sunset,and before sunrise,i have seen a few in daylight,and they look like stars moving,the summer before,was real crazy,here,we,saw,like,75 ufo's,/up,til,a couple yrs ago,i never saw more than 15-20,in my life,somethin's goin on,and i saw,on history channel,last yr,that 2 yrs ago,,in summer,more ufo's were reported over pa,than ever before,i can attest to that,note,when i see them,they are always star like,moving,slow,than,increasing speed all off a sudden to like infinity,most real high,a few,very low and slow,than,they speed up real,quick,i have only seen a few,go in different zig-zag,directions,,well,thats it for my report,for now,i will keep lookin up at the stars at night,for more.//ps,in my opinion,the ufo's,are either,our's,or thier's,i've never seen any aliens yet,,or been abducted,that i know of,..
content.summary: Big huge bright star low and slow moving se,very clear night

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along 386 when i saw ball of light just appear right above the interstate it sat for a few seconds then was come my direction. i called my friend who was driving just infront of me and we both slowed down to 45 talking trying to figure out what we both were seeing. there was no sound from it yet it was clearly over a few hundred feet up. it made a sharp turn up and out after it went out of sight past us.  the light was bigger then any engine could of created.  i beleive it was a ufo, i couldnt get the picture out of my head.  i know somethings out there and, i think we need to know the truth.
content.summary: A hugh ball of light, size of an aircraft itself passing overhead less then 300ft above.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the bedroom straightening out he blankets on the bed wit the window open for fresh air. all of a sudden i heard loud military chopper passing over soto see a low flying military chopper chasing a green orb. it was roughly about 1000 feet above (maybe a bit less than that). i yelled for my husband to look and as he ran down the hall, i pushed him out of the way to make it to the living room to grab the video cam and go outside. (moved to evidence section)fg 

i grabbed the video cam and went out the front door just in time to see it still flying towards my complex then overhead. i did get it on film so i have about 30 seconds of film. i have not reviewed it yet because i wanted to fill out this report. my husband experienced this event with e as well. the speed of the chopper and orb was maybe about 10-15 mph if it were cars on the road. they were low enough to rattle things on the shelves and walls.

i have been keeping all of my footage and photos to myself and sharing it with alternate researchers (not mufon), but i felt that just maybe someone else will report in this time and report the same thing tha my husband and i experienced.
content.summary: Green orb chased by the military

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i on june 28, 2011, were walking in san diego about 8:30 pm and we both saw a yellow-gold set of lights that seemed to be hovering or moving very slowly at about 45 degrees.  there was no motor sound even when the lights started moving faster.  the lights would seem to go from four into two or one and then reappear.  we both thought it could be our bad eyes or vapor in the air that made the lights seem to dance.  we both knew we'd never seem something so odd in in the sky and it was eerie that there was no noise, especially after it seemed to accelerate and simply disappear before our very eyes.
content.summary: Witnessed set of yellow lights in the evening sky hovering and slowly moving without any sound.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend m. and i sat down to relax on my parents patio. we had just eaten dinner and decided to light a fire.  we were facing southeast towards haystack mountain, seated next to each other talking, and i had just opened a beer (my first one of the night, alcohol played no factor in the sighting).  i remembered looking up and noting how clear the sky was as the sun was setting, and glanced straight up above our heads and saw a light like a star, only much much brighter, like 10 or 20 stars worth of bright. i thought it was a plane with a reflection, but the sun had set long ago. it was moving, but kinda gliding along, it didnt seem propelled, and initially in a southeast direction. i nudged m. and pointed up at the light. she stopped mid-sentence and stared. so did i. i said something about it being totally silent. thinking it was gone over the mountain and behind the trees, i said jokingly "i hope they come for us!" and took a drink from my bottle.  if nothing happened after this point i would have still thought the light was out of place, it just seemed like it wasnt supposed to be there.  i glanced up again to where i saw the object last, and it was just moving through the same space in the trees as it had just moved.  i know that sounds insane, but the only way i can describe it is: glitch in the matrix.  like in the movie the matrix when the cat walks in front of the door twice, like its on a loop.  only it seemed brighter and bigger than before. my girlfriend saw the same thing. i just cant make sense of what happened there. it was moving fast enough that it should have kept going over the mountain and out of sight, it was like magic.  all of this happened in about 15 - 30 seconds.  hard to tell really my jaw was hanging open.  i had to get a better look so i ran out to the alley behind the house for a better look, about 30 feet east of where we first saw it, and it wasn't in the part of the sky i expected it to be, it was further down the mountain towards cumberland.  it seemed to be moving faster as i was yelling for m. to come look.  from the time she walked from one end of the driveway to the other it had changed from a solid bright white light, like a star much bigger than any in the sky maybe 10 or 20 times, down to the shape and size of a dim red star on a clear night, and vanished.  it looked like light that just faded out smoothly to a single point, then gone.  i cant give you a distance from us to the craft with any accuracy, but it was maybe 50 - 200 feet above haystack mountain when it faded out, so maybe 250 - 500 feet directly above us at first sight.  i was excited, and m. was just saying "what was that? what was that?".  and to make it creepier, there was not a sound to be heard, my parents live in a fairly quiet and secluded place. there was no sound. that was not an airplane, blimp, or helicopter.  i am still trying to wrap my brain around this one. i wish i had a photo, but honestly it would look like a photo of stars, one being much brighter than the others.  feel free to ask any questions, i will give as much information as i can. thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Very bright light/object passed overhead, moved strangely behind trees, gained better view to watch it disappear above mountain

content.detailedDescription:
I currently live back home with my parents in west carters valley in kingsport tn... we are near the hawkins county line and the holston river. it is very rural out here. on june 25th 2011 i saw what i thought to be a ufo while out star gazing in my parents back yard. my mother had been standing in the front yard and i walked to the front to talk to her but she had gone inside... all of the sudden over a tree line to the west i saw a very bright led type light traveling oddly in the sky with a smaller light dot traveling behind it looked like toward the north. the movement lasted for about under a minute... i called my mother outside and as she exited the house it was gone... so i let it go as i told her what i saw she thought i was a little silly. this happened at approximately 11:30-11:45 pm est. the sky was completely clear that night.
tonight at approximately 11:15 pm est i was sitting out on the front porch talking to my father who was watering the flowers in the front of the house and wouldn't you know! it was the light again! i was not seeking it out because i had ruled it out before as a possible satellite...Etc....The light was traveling alone this time... and my father saw it this time as well! i checked on a few satellite trackers and star maps.. and iss app that i have available on my phone device to rule out any space junk etc. and there was nothing at that moment. this time the light appeared a little lower... but was also to the west moving north.. seemed to be moving quicker this time. on the 25th the light was brighter. thinking about the location both nights it could be a possibility that it is following the holston river up in to southwest virginia...Maybe the yuma area... i know that this was not an aircraft... and i did not hear any noise. i will be checking the skies every night now between the 11 and midnight hour in hopes the sky is clear where i can possibly catch this on camera. anyone from the east tn mufon can feel free to contact me. i do prefer email... i think it would be interesting to try and seek out what the source of this light is. it has me a little nervous to be honest.. but i feel i would like to seek it out....... even if i have to seek it out myself by automobile.
content.summary: 2nd sighting this week.

content.detailedDescription:
Thought i was looking at an on coming airliner at cruising alt.  when it was closer and going overhead there were no wingtip or body marker lights.
 also it stayed looking the same going away, like when its main headlights are coming at you . time sunset/dusk   10:15pm dst   took 2 /3 mins   looked like normal altitude for airliner at cruising speed ( i live in the
landing path to metro airport, dearborn)  no jet sound   it was just bright
white type oval looking light from when i first saw it till it went out of veiw.   i was just sitting in my backyard smoking, just watching the sky as drakness was happening. looking at planes and waiting for stars starting to show up in darkness.   planes going into metro fly from northeast to southwest and are at  1500 feet as they fly by   this was going from northwest to southeast  till it faded away in the distance as a normal jet would.       i have no pictures, drawings, etc.
content.summary: Bright object going from northwest to southeast . thought it was jet liner but as it went overhead there no marker lights,and it stayed just as bright going away

content.detailedDescription: My wife was out on the back patio waiting for the dogs while they did thier business at about 10:05pm and then she called me outside at 10:10pm to look at this bright round white light in the sky slowly moving from the north-west to south-east direction with no sound. we watched it for about 5 minutes and then the went out and it was gone. there were no blinking maker lights that you would see on airplanes since we live close to the airport and see air traffic over our house very often. it appeared to be flying higher than the normal air traffic that was taking off from the airport but lower than another airplane that was higher up in the sky with red blinking marker lights flying in the north-west direction. the sky was very clear tonight with no clouds.
content.summary: Slowly flew from the north-west to south-east direction with no sound and apeared to be a bright round white light

content.detailedDescription: On june 29th around 10:10pm i was standing on the back deck of my house with my husband. a bright light in the sky caught my eye, when it was almost overhead as it came into view from the side of my house. it was coming from the north heading south. both of us were amazed by how bright it was. airplanes almost never fly that path over our house as well. it was a yellow/white light���. maybe three times the size of the biggest and brightest star or planet in the sky. it flew overhead at the speed of a regular airplane, but seemed low and was completely silent. i ran in the house and grabbed my binoculars.  when i first pointed the binoculars at the moving bright light���it was almost blinding, and no other lights could be seen. no red, or blue lights like a regular plane.  as the bright moving light flew out of sight i could see other airplanes in the area on both sides one flying to the east, and another flying to the west. this light was so bright it was the most oddest thing to see fly over���. especially in comparison to the other planes in the area.
content.summary: Very big, bright, silent light flys over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
My encounter takes place on june 25, 2011 on delta flight 2363 leaving out of jfk (new york) heading to lax (los angeles), departure time 7:00pm.
the first strange thing about the flight was that they rushed us onboard. i had specifically asked at the service desk previously whether the flight was going to arrive and take off on time, and i was told that it was. so i was surprised that an announcement came on the overhead telling people to take their seats as quickly as possible because we were the first cleared for immediate take off. people were still boarding the plane, and rushing up the aisle to their seats because of this sense of urgency. i was sitting on the right hand side of plane by the window, at the emergency exit. there was a young woman next to me and a young man on the other side of her. a flight attendant came by and asked us if we had any problem with helping out during an emergency since we were sitting by the emergency exits. i said no and so did the guy, but the girl next to me had headphones on and was sleeping apparently. the attendant made her wake up because he needed a verbal response. she made some kind of response but the words couldn't be understood, and sounded unusual. i'm pretty good with accents, and couldn't place it at all. it sounded like more than an accent issue. the attendant repeated himself a couple times because he couldn't understand either, and finally the guy sitting with us said she understood and agreed. the attendant left, and i didn't see him again. a new attendant came and strapped himself into the seatbelts on the wall infront of our three seats. he was tall, extremely thin, bald with tan skin. he never smiled or made eye contact like normal attendants do. after take off, he left. the lavatories/restrooms were on the other side of the wall infront of us. one was in my line of sight because it was diagonal to where we were sitting. a female attendant with a strange, wobbly walk kept going back and forth checking into the bathrooms. i noticed the bald, male attendant started to do it too. about an hour or so into the flight i went to the restroom. there was something in the air in there that was making me cough badly. i returned to my seat having a coughing fit. a few other passengers who went to the restroom started coughing too i noticed. 
   when the food cart came around i got an apple juice and some cookies. again i started coughing violently due to a tingly feeling in my throat. i don't have any known food allergies. usually when people start coughing, other people move away, but the girl next to me took off her sweater jacket and actually moved closer. i noticed a very sweet perfume smell wafting from her and the guy's direction. when random people started going past for the restrooms, some of them would smell unusually foul, others would smell sweet. it was very strange. two men, one of them with no shoes or socks on, started doing stretching exercises by the restroom doors.
 then i started to have a pulse go through my body at different intervals (like a mild electric pulse that contracted some muscles and spread upwards). i couldn't control it and didn't know what was causing it. it would literally make me jump in my seat at times, and i noticed whenever this happened, i would hear the people in rows behind me react with laughter, whistles, chirping bird-like sounds, and something that sounded like a purr. it did not sound human at all, except for the laughs/giggles. the guy sitting one seat from me was on some kind of computer device that looked like an ipad.
   when i looked out the window about three or more hours into flight, i noticed unusual cloud cover. it was dark, roiling clouds. at this altitude, clouds are usually flat and non distinct beneath you. but these were like foamy rain clouds, and near the plane. a amber yellow light started to streak the clouds and illuminate them. then they started to fade into wisps. outside the plane, beyond the right wing and slightly behind, a yellow oval light was following plane. and as i looked below, a bunch of lights started to appear. they were clustered together in spherical formation at the center of a web-like arangement. a few lights in linear formation would branch off from some of the center clusters (like spokes on a wheel). they were white, amber, yellow lights. i would have to describe it as a fleet. they kept pace with the plane for awhile, 10-15 minutes. i was having trouble staring out window because the pulses through my body had increased in frequency and intensity. when i looked away from window it would stop. when i looked back it would start again. i was being trained not to look out the window. 
   the girl next to me started stretching alot. at one point she leaned all the way forwards for awhile and i could see that her torso looked alot longer than before, and something was going on with her shoulder blades. when she sat back up her head, which had been lower than mine's before was now on level with mine's at minimum. she turned to look at me and out the corner of my eye i could tell her face had significantly lengthened. her eyes seemed more prominent. i did not turn my head to look. i wish that i had, but at the time i was in shock. she looked away, and in a few minutes deliberately touched her foot to my lower leg. i got a tingle sensation that was different from the pulses. she went back to sleeping position when i didn't move or look. the guy one seat over from me was tapping away at the computer device, and every time he gave a big tap i would get a pulse. then sometimes he would lean forward and hold his head, or lean his head back in the seat, and then i would get a series of intense pulses. he looked over at me a couple of times, and left me with no doubt it was him doing it.
at the end of the flight when we got off, i noticed the girl went off with a large group of people from the plane in the baggage claim area. she also had an unusual gait. i'd like to note that there was absolutely no turbulence on the plane ride. smoothest ride i've ever taken, and i fly quite a bit. also, at no point did i feel threatened...In shock yes, but not threatened or fearful for my life. and my asthma symptoms were much improved for days afterward. i'd just like answeres to what happened. i think about it every minute, every second.
content.summary: Saw many ufo's outside of a plane window while in flight. had alien presence onboard the flight with me.

content.detailedDescription: Just laid down in bed when i seen what i thought was a bright star through my blinds. i got up and looked at it and thought maybe it was mars. laid back down and seen the object up higher in the blinds so i thought it was moving towards me.This is the fifth time i have witnessed an orb ufo. i walked outside and it was very bright moving about ten miles an hour overhead and to the left no sound whatsoever.Looked the absolute same coming towards me, overhead and going away. the last one i seen i had binoculars and seen through the light to see a shape like a cross with a red light and blue light not visible without binocs. almost looks like you could throw a rock and hit them.Very strange i wish i knew more about my sightings. my ex girlfriend witnessed three of the event on the nothside of springfield. she was stupified like me after every sighting
content.summary: Bright star/orb

content.detailedDescription:
They are not the alien's mechanic craft, they are just the shape of grouped ufos.
this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo  year 2006---2010

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside enjoying the clear evening sky when i saw with my naked eye what i think was a satellite crossing the sky. it started from the south and a little east maybe.  it was heading to the north-south and vanished on the south and a little bit west part of my sky.

this one was actually one of the brightest i have seen so i simply gave it attribute to the clearness of the sky. oh yeah, it was kinda going just a little faster than i'm used to them going.  i thought nothing of it other than it was pretty cool and kinda bright.  it lasted a little longer in the sky then a cigarette worth so, when it disappeared into the contrast of the sky to the north, i decided to stay out for a bit and watch for more. 

note: there is about 1/3 of the northern sky not visible to me due to the contrast of the sky, not sure if it's city lights, or the sun hazing it out a bit.

after a duration of about 3 minutes or so, another satellite came on the same exact trajectory.  the difference was, this one was not nearly as bright. it was about as bright as the dimmer stars in the sky.  i stayed, and followed it across the sky just like the last one.  i started loosing it to the change in sky contrast to the north, it disappears for just a fraction of a second, then (don't know how else to explain it) exploded in bright light for almost an entire second, then disappeared completely.  the flash was 3-4 times that of the brightest star in the sky that night, it actually gave off a diamond shape, just like you would imagine the star of bethlehem.

so was it a ufo?  i can't say i have ever seen a satellite do that, i may have seen more than the average person, but not as many as a real stargazer. it was pretty cool, but i'm pretty sure it was just a satellite crossing over.  you decide.
content.summary: Bright diamond shape flash 3-4 x that of star, likely a satelite in orbit crossing sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My little brother brian took this picture while we were at the goldfields goldmine in apache junction.  this is the second time this object has appeared close to me which i have the visual proof event, the 1st time was in las vegas march of 1993 spring mtn and decator rd 10:00am hovering over las vegas. two other friends and i viewed the phoenix, along with a few other gas station customers, from the terrible herbst gas station at that intersection.  it hovered facing our direction we were west of and we watch it slowly do a 180 turn and go back into the clouds. the whole event lasted 5mins.  incidentally, the sky was complete overcast with the exception of a perfect circle cut in the clouds revealing the only blue in the sky behind the craft. two years later i unintentionally bought a book ufo sightings which shows a picture of this craft on fire in the night sky taken in siberia 1974.
the part i am hesitant of discussing is i think i was abducted as a child in mesa where i grew up when i was about 6 or 7 and when i lived in las vegas in 1993 when i was 23, i was residing close to tropicana and buffalo roads which was  considered the outskirts of town then. that's when the last abduction event i can recall took place.  that story is a bit long so i will stick with this sighting.(but it all connects and seems relevant)   how i came up with the name of the craft was from a series of events.  i named the craft the phoenix after attending the phoenix lights convention in 1998 and after viewing the craft up close and buying the book with the image of it.  it was the phoenix emblem projected on the wall at the convention center at the conference that gave me that idea.  on another note, i think i have been on this craft and i have met the personnel and aliens that fly the craft, but again that is a different story which to this day i still believe.  this craft is extremely impressive and is light stealth brown.  to view craft must re-size image larger. the craft is to the right of the water tower.
content.summary: Phoenix

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to have a smoke on my front porch and noticed it there hovering, at first i thought it was a constellation of loose aluminized balloons, after a short bit of time i realized it was not, it was approx  50'of the ground 1/4 mile to northeast of my position, i ran into the house to get my camera, took a minute or so to find it and turn it on memory was full except one pic left i took the picture, and while i was deleting some other pictures to make room, it zipped an an extremely high rate of acceleration to the north, it was out of sight in about 2 or 3 seconds.
content.summary: Silver, 4 circular lobes, connected by a cross looking frame aprox size 18 wheel tractor trailer,

content.detailedDescription: This wasn't the first time i've seen these guys. noticed that this particular one seems to be getting a lot of attention lately. it's the triangular orangish lights. i've been seeing them quite often may-june of this year, 2011. they can interchange with each other appearing to be disconnected, and sometime beam bright and then disappear. i like them, and enjoy seeing them. :)
content.summary: Orange triangle of lights

content.detailedDescription:
I should have reported this a long time ago. the details of what my sister and i witnessed is not as clear today as it was about 5-6 years ago, when it occurred. but it continues to baffle me. from time to time i search for ufo sighting reports that sound similar to what i saw, and i never find anything even remotely like it reported. here's what we saw:

it was winter of either 2005 or 2006, i can't quite remember what year it was now. we were driving home from a friend's house a few miles away, probably a little past 2 in the morning. as we were driving down garden street in mt. holly, we came to the stop sign at monmouth rd. i looked both ways for a moment when my sister exclaimed, "oh my god! look!" and to the right was this thing in the sky. it wasn't moving at all and we heard no noise as it hovered. it's hard to tell how far it was above the ground without knowing how large the object was. if i had to guess i would say it was very large and about 3 or 4 football fields above the ground. this is an area with a lot of houses and trees. but i saw no trees moving, no breeze or anything. there is also a lake in that area (in the vicinity of upper lake), and it looked like it was right around that spot. the object, as i remember it, was metallic, bulky and irregular shaped, like a crumples piece of metal or something. it's very hard to describe. the metal itself had a jigsaw puzzle type of design to it, as if it was a bunch of patchwork metal piecing the whole thing together. and the bottom looked like it had lights on it that shined up at its underbelly, lighting the up bottom. but there were also shadows on the underbelly because of the irregular shaping of it. it was definitely illuminated, but not very bright. just bright enough to be able to distinguish the jigsaw-like appearance of it. the top was more or less in shadows.

we sat at the stop sign staring at it in shock or awe or something for what i would guess to be around 3-5 minutes, before my sister said, "go! go! go!" and i sped off back to our house. my house is only maybe 1 or 2 miles tops (bird's eye view) from that spot. we looked around in the direction we had seen it in when we got home but saw nothing. either it vanished or the treetops covered it (which would mean it was very low to the ground), or i don't know, we couldn't see it from our front door for whatever reason, i don't know. i never saw it again, although i always hoped i would, and still do hope. my house was a few towns over from both fort dix and maguire air force bases--about a 25 minute drive away.

i looked for newspaper reports of a ufo sighting the following days but didn't find anything. whatever we saw was unreported as far as i could find out. i'm hoping someone will be able to shed some light on what it was that we saw. i didn't have a camera on my phone at that time, and i regret not having any photos of it--although i'm not sure i would have thought (or had the nerve) to take a picture in that exact moment. i always felt i had seen something incredible, and unique. i've tried sketching it, but i have a very hard time trying to put on paper what i see in my mind's eye, and i'm an artist by profession. i will keep on trying so i have something to show that maybe someone will one day recognize.... and if i'm fortunate enough to see that, or anything like it again, i will report it right away and do my best to have a visual to go along with it.
content.summary: My sister and i saw an object hovering silently in the sky that was unique in shape and features

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were fishing at hamilton pond when we heard what sounded like a hissing from above. we looked up to see a bright silver object that at first looked like piece of cellophane, but realized it was a craft of some sort and egg shaped. it was wobbling erratically as if hit by something. it descended rapidly behind the tree line to the north of where we were standing and disappeared. we ran to our truck and drove toward where we thought it may have went, but the area was inaccessible.
content.summary: Egg shaped craft, silver in color. looks like it hit something in the sky then fell.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed but not asleep in one upstairs bedroom.  my partner was downstairs watching eleven oclock late news.  at 11:50pm on june 28, 2011 he came upstairs to go to bed in room on opposite side of house.  he heard a truck sound and since we live across from a park we have had some vandalism and so he got up and opened the blinds to look at the street which is visible from the bedroom window.  he looked up and over the rooftop of the house beside us three orange balls in a straight line with one trailing behind (created a triangle look) were approching our home at a very low altitude..Around 500 ft or so...A height that our police helicopters fly often.  he yelled at me and i rushed to the room and saw the objects. i said lets go outside to see if there is any noise. we rushed downstairs and ran outside. he said to me this can't be a plane the back ball is too far back, could it be helicopters flying together?  i didn't think so, because they were orange balls. i said lets get outside to see if there is any sound. the formation turned slightly to the right as they went over the neighbors home and we watched from the patio as they moved by.  there was absolutely no sound and they did not vary from the formation as they slowly moved across the back yard area and over the homes that surround my back yard and slowly we lost sight of them as they moved on.  we were so shocked that as i had gone back into the house and gotten my camera and tried to take a picture i had the flash on and all you could see was the umbrella in the foreground of the shot.  unbelievable.  just unbelievable.  we were so amazed and really somewhat frightened we could not sleep for hours.  i called the police department, airport tower and a television station to see if anyone else had seen this unbelievable sight since it was flying so slow and so low, but at that time which was around 12:30am on june 29, 2011 no one had apparently called them.
content.summary: Four orange orbes flying in formation.  three in a line and fourth behind no more than 500 ft and no sound.  traveling slowly across sky over my home.  visibility very good.

content.detailedDescription: I ufo hunt.  and sometimes i take pictures instead of video-quicker to review.  this is one i happened upon, if i can find the drawing i made that i saw through 10x50 binoculars ill attatch it as well as i believe them to be of the same family.  the scanner didnt do justice on the drawing, but u get the hint.  the one in the drawing i was watching pop up and sit for a few seconds then shift positions and was actually looking through the binoculars when it appeared the last time, ironically over a cow lot two properties over.  i saw a weird pinkish/orangish/violet colored cylindrical cloud cocked at about 45-50 degrees in a gap in the trees in back, as i looked at it the object in the drawing sort of materialized after the cloud disappeared.  the red ball was not attached by solid object, sort of floated.  the material looked very flat, charcoal color with straight facets and the direction it moved wasnt inline with the machine, like it was free instead of driving like a car, but when i saw it the big end was the leading side
content.summary: Didnt see them until looking at picture

content.detailedDescription: This photos were taken by my brother from the balcony of his apartment on the 7��������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������� floor, in matosinhos, portugal.The object were headind from south to north along the coast and the distance with be quite large, probably the size of an airplane.
content.summary: Ufo in form of clover

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on i57 at the chebanse 302 exit ramp. there was two of us that seen it at the same time. we parked the car and got out to stare at it. it was climbing higher moving straight up... maybe curving a little tiny bit east. we ruled out an jet due to the odd looking shape. also, i have never seen a smoke tail look like that. the smoke trail was rather short but, fanned out .. was quite amazing. at first we thought we were looking at the asteroid. after watching it and realizing it was moving up..And its maneuvers led me to the conclusion it was indeed a ufo.
content.summary: Daytime ufo/cylinder moving straight up at high altitude with a white fan smoke tail

content.detailedDescription: Walking from lei garden restaurant in beijing back to the crowne plaza hotel i had taken a moment to look up and see if i could see stars in the sky. during the stay so far, i have not been able to see a blue sky or a darkness to the night sky, most likely because of the gaseous pollution. anyway, upon looking up towards the south, i noticed a bright object emitting a redish color. a moment or more later, i noticed more objects to the further south. each had a stationary appearance and then upon a few moments more observation, they began changing color and flickering and some in the far distance began swaying and in my words "dancing" in a slight side to side movement. at first i wasn't able to really tell if these were advertisement balloons or something else in the sky until they really started to do special movements and changes in color etc. after a long period of just observing and such, the farther ones kind of faded away off to some other part beyond vision, while the closer one seemed to stick around with me for awhile. eventually i had to go inside, and the close one also gradually went away. hopefully there were others that observed them also. cheers
content.summary: Multiple objects giving off multicolor light

content.detailedDescription: While smoking in the parking lot of my business, observed a large dull silver/gray cylinder flying at high altitude from e - w high in the sky. it was a nearly cloudless day, and i was with my co-owner, who also witnessed the craft. she went inside and grabbed binoculars - which i used to observe the craft in more detail.  no wings, no tail, no contrail. a large cylinder, at least twice the size of a large jetliner, with rounded ends vs pointy nose and tail.  estimated altitude 30,000 ft. there was no sound, but from that altitude and distance, not surprising. we watched as the cylinder crossed the sky over kokomo slightly to our north from east to west - a total of maybe two minutes - last seen heading over burlington due west of kokomo.
content.summary: Large cylinder overflew kokomo in mid-day

content.detailedDescription:
I`ll give you no description because they still here. i`ll will send you some pictures for you to check it out and keep in touch....

sorry, i forgot to tell you that i have severial videos for you to beleve in me, but i���ll start to send you the pictures
content.summary: They are trying to give a massage
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: We were at 1000n and 2000s rd. we were out there in the dark country star gazing and ufo hunting. it was a perfect clear sky. we noticed a bright bluish white light that seemed to be too big to be a star..Nw of our position. at first sight i started focusing in the camera and couldnt get a lock on it. i then realized it is headed right at us. it wasnt stationary anymore. se flight pattern. it got straight above us above 600ft over head it just turned out its bright white light. no other lights were visible. there was no sound at all and it looked like the shape of this thing was blocking out the sky behind it.. it looked like a huge triangle. we got really nervous since it stopped right over us. we jumped back in the car and got to civilization rather quickly. its one of things where you think.. i should be careful what i wish for.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was star gazing/ ufo hunting. noticed in the western sky a bright bluish white light.. at first thought it was stationary and maybe a really bright big star.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in my car just ahead of my wife who was following me home. i looked up in the sky and saw three bright lights in a triangle formation. i thought for certain that a commercial aircraft was crashing/landing. i pointed out the window to make sure my wife was looking at it too. i had the windows down and i didn't hear any noises. she called me and said that she too had no idea what it was. it hovered slowly over rt 1 and almost went right over the top of my car. when it turned it banked a bit and i could see a fourth bright red light underneath the craft. i could tell it was a solid object because i couldn't see stars between the lights. i never grabbed for my iphone to record it because i thought that i'd eventually figure out what it was. i was not worried of anything like that. the three white lights were non-blinking and were extremely bright. it was odd because the light did not illuminate the craft. it was as if the material was designed to absorb light. we eventually made a left turn to head towards our house and could still see the object between the tree line. however by the time we turned the object was too far in front of us to see and eventually we lost sight of it. when the object hovered over the highway it was slow, noiseless, and seemed to be very low to the ground. i was dark and i found it very difficulty to just size and distance. i've seen f-117s before and it was not that. it was the strangest thing i have ever seen. i was never worried, only very curious. it wasn't until after the incident did i realize what i had seen. it flew way too low and slow to be an aircraft.
content.summary: Black triangle with three bright lights in fredericksburg, va
